meanings.definition: A person who has an extreme fear of spiders.
meanings.sent1: The arachnophobe screamed when they saw a tiny spider.
meanings.sent2: My friend is an arachnophobe and always asks me to remove spiders from the room.
meanings.sent3: The arachnophobe tried to conquer their fear by watching a cartoon spider show.
meanings.sent4: The arachnophobe's fear of spiders was like a dark cloud following them everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The arachnophobe's heart raced as they imagined spiders crawling all over them.
